attributes.action: Hold a referendum to apply to rejoin the European Union.
attributes.additional_details: During the last EU referendum the public were given false and misleading information from both sides of the leave and remain sides, now we the public know the truth and what it means in leaving the EU, a new referendum to be held, to seek if the public wish to go back in to the EU.
attributes.background: Apply to rejoin the European Union.

rejection.details:
It's not clear whether you'd like the Government to apply to rejoin the EU, or to hold a referendum with the question of whether the public would like the Government to apply to rejoin the EU. 

You could start a petition that focuses on the Government holding a referendum on membership of the EU. 

You might also like to sign this petition calling on the Government to apply to rejoin the EU: 

Apply to Join the European Union (EU)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616636
